newsitem.title: JAPAN: NEC shares up on hopes for telecom sector.
newsitem.headline: NEC shares up on hopes for telecom sector.

text.p: Shares in NEC Corp rose on Monday morning, helped by growing hopes for the telecommunications sector, brokers said.
The share price was up 20 yen at 1,400 yen at 0034 GMT. Volume was 3.416 million shares, ranking it the most heavily traded issue on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange.
Market hopes of strong earnings in the telecommunications sector were sparked by Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Corp's (NTT) solid half-year earnings announced last week, brokers said.
The telecommunications giant announced on Friday that its parent current profit for the six months to September 30 soared to 207.75 billion yen from 126.78 billion yen in the same period last year.
NTT shares rallied on Friday, but gave up part of their gains on Monday morning, easing 9,000 yen to 811,000 yen at 0101 GMT.
